reply.author: Pipper Publishing
reply.content: Thanks Terence - glad it's working for you! Feel free to send feature requests to our email (in About).

author: Matthew Falk
comment: I had a previous version on my last phone. It worked perfectly. Since changing phones and downloading this again, the period time won't adjust from 45 minutes. Nothing I do changes this.  Edit: after contacting the publisher, everything has been fixed and works perfectly again! This is a perfect watch app for soccer officials!

reply.author: Pipper Publishing
reply.content: Hi Matthew, I'm sorry to hear about your problem. Can you email us at the address on the About page and I'm sure we can get this taken care of quickly.

author: George Sariego
comment: Great idea! Please add ability to set different intervals. I.e. 2 minute quarter intervals with 5 minute half time.  Update: it stopped working and is super buggy. Uninstalled...Going back to my trusty stopwatch.

reply.author: Pipper Publishing
reply.content: Hi George - Sorry for your experience. As you can see from the recent updates, there was a bug affecting some users which is fixed. Hope you'll give it another try or look at the Pro version which has lots of goodies for soccer referees.

author: Kevin Culp
comment: Love the app so far, just wish there was a way to set a custom length for the interval timer

reply.author: Pipper Publishing
reply.content: Hi Kevin, I m guessing you know that you can tap the watchface during the Interval to skip to the end?

author: Leo C
comment: I wasnt able to use the free version of Referee Watch for my ASUS ZenWatch. The watch face doesnt show in Android Wear or as an option on my watch. I

reply.author: Pipper Publishing
reply.content: Hi Leo: Thanks for working with me to fix this problem - can you update your review accordingly?

author: Kip Billings
comment: I want to use this on my Samsung Gear S3, but Android Wear doesn't recognize this new watch.  Is there an updated version that works with Samsung Gear and S Health?  I was looking forward to using this referee app this coming spring soccer season!  I can't really rate this app without trying it but I want to give it a 5 if I could.

reply.author: Pipper Publishing
reply.content: Kip, unfortunately Referee Watch Free doesn't support the Tizen o/s which is what the Samsung Gear watches run. Although the watch is listed as an Android Wear watch, I can understand that it is confusing.

author: Tomek Kuczwara
comment: OK, so I got a chance to use this on 4 indoor soccer games last night and I have to say that I really like it. It's easy to set the needed time, reset the timers and add scores. Overall a great app. Some potential added things could be a step or distance counter. One thing I noticed that is a bit concerning is that my battery drained by 50% in 4 hours using the dimmed 1 second update mode on my Sony Smartwatch 3. That's quite a lot. My score is 4.5+ out of 5. Great job.

reply.author: Pipper Publishing
reply.content: Thanks Tomek - great feedback! Love the idea about step/distance counter; I'm working on Fit integration which should enable a lot of that. Re the battery life - it's not so great on the Smartwatch; you'll do even better with the Power Save mode (1 minute update) - how is that for you?

author: Percy Kawas
comment: Only reason why I purchased Android watch. I was looking out for ref watches to replace mine. Saw the app an purchased a Sony & loaded app. Too many features. Love the fact it is easy to stop and restart time. The reminder is also great that clock is stooped. Vibrate alert. Count up or down timer - screen shows both so you can pick mode you are used to. If you are a referee (or umpire) do yourself a favor and use this app. The watches will see so antiquated!!! I see myself using this for other sports too.
title: Only reason for Android wear as a referee...

author: Jeffrey Pugh
comment: Everything I've always wanted in my Referee watch! Better than the custom watches like the Spintso - very easy to configure on the watch or  mobile.
title: Great soccer watch/timer!
